scripts.build-image: export SEA_STACK_VERSION=$(jq -r .version apps/web/package.json) && docker build . -t ghcr.io/seastackapp/seastack:latest -t ghcr.io/seastackapp/seastack:$SEA_STACK_VERSION
scripts.push-image: export SEA_STACK_VERSION=$(jq -r .version apps/web/package.json) && docker push ghcr.io/seastackapp/seastack:latest && docker push ghcr.io/seastackapp/seastack:$SEA_STACK_VERSION
